page.title: 07BROUGHTON HALL BROUGHTON
page.content: NEWSPAPER,OIL FOR HEATING,CALOR GAS FOR COOKING.TWO BUSES PER WEEK TUESDAY AND SATURDAY.RUN TWO CARS,FORD ESCORTS,FOR SHOPPING RAILWAY STATION, HOSPITAL, DENTIST ETC. HOUSE ELCTRICALLY LIT PLUS EMERGENCY LIGHTING BY BATTERY, DISCHARGED REGULARLY OIL-FIRED CENTRAL HEATING, ALL CHIMNEYS BLOCKED OFF, OWN WATER SUPPLY PUMPED ELECTRICALLY.INCOME;PENSIONS,OPEN DAYS,SUMMER AND PREXMAS,DONATIONS,VISITORS ABOUT 50 PER WEEK,NO CHARGE BUT BOOKLETS POSTCARDS AND HANDCRAFTS ON SALE SET IN 20 ACRES,MOSTLY PARKLAND 3.79 ACRE FIELD GRAZING.BURIAL GROUND PRIVATE .57 WALLED GARDEN 1.82 THREE GARDENERS,ONE MAINTENANCE MAN. THE HOUSE IS SELF-SUPPORTING IN FRUIT,VEGETABLES AND EGGS,HENS 120 ALL FREE RANGE,THEIR FLESH IS ALSO EATEN.
